from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

import json
import logging
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

@logging_to_appins
def copy_source_file_for_schema_creation(source_id): 

    # read orchestration data
    path_to_file = "abfss://odw-config@"+storage_account+"orchestration/orchestration.json"
    df = spark.read.option("multiline","true").json(path_to_file)

    definitions = json.loads(df.toJSON().first())['definitions']
    definition = next(d for d in definitions if d['Source_ID'] == source_id)

    source_file = get_latest_file_path(definition)
    target_folder = "abfss://odw-config@"+storage_account+"schema_creation/"

    if source_file and source_file.path:
        mssparkutils.fs.cp(source_file.path, target_folder)
